## INodePackageJson.exports property

The "exports" field is used to specify the entry points for a package. See [Node.js documentation](https://nodejs.org/api/packages.html#exports)

**Signature:**

```typescript
exports?: string | string[] | Record<string, null | string | IPackageJsonExports>;
```
